ValidationRule.description: In order for the FBAE ready to Transfer Date field to be populated the following fields are required - H&B Client, Benefit Renewal Month and Training Completed/Certification Receive. Or both the Lost Product (FBAE) and FBAE IC fields must be populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ( NOT(ISBLANK(FBAE_ready_to_Transfer_Date__c))), ( ( ISPICKVAL(H_B_Client__c, '') ) || ( ISBLANK(Benefit_Renewal_Month__c) ) || ( ISPICKVAL(Training_Completed_Certification_Receive__c, '') ) ), ( ( Lost_Product_FBAE__c = FALSE ) || ( ISBLANK(FBAE_IC__c ) ) ), $Profile.Name <>"System Administrator" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: In order for the FBAE ready to Transfer Date field to be populated the following fields are required - H&B Client, Benefit Renewal Month and Training Completed/Certification Receive. Or both the Lost Product (FBAE) and FBAE IC fields must be populated.
